<h3>A tutorial which teaches you how to compile QScintilla, which is essential for QtLuaPad to be compiled.</h3>

= Introduction =

First of all you'll need the QScintilla library which can be found here: <a href="http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/qscintilla/download">QScintilla</a>.

Extract its contents to your desktop and then run Qt Command Line.
